definitions.definition: A point maintained in an argument, or a line of argument taken in its support; the subject matter of discussion of strife; a position taken or contended for.
examples: It is my contention that state lotteries are taxes on stupid people.

definitions.definition: Competition by parts of a system or its users for a limited resource .

secondary_definitions: A point maintained in an argument, or a line of argument taken in its support; the subject matter of discussion of strife; a position taken or contended for.
( computing , telecommunications ) Competition by parts of a system or its users for a limited resource .
